CustomField.formula:
IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Disposed"), "", IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Technician Desk"), "", IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Walnut Creek Office"), "Portsmouth Enterprise", IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Celebration Office"), "Portsmouth Enterprise", IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Miami Office"), "Portsmouth Enterprise", IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Singapore Office"), "AP", IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Shanghai Office"), "AP", IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "London Office"), "EMEA", IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Atlanta Office"), "Portsmouth Enterprise",
IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Portsmouth Office") && NI_Department__r.Name = "300", "Sales",
IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Portsmouth Office") && NI_Department__r.Name = "400", "Support",
IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Portsmouth Office") && NI_Department__r.Name = "720", "QA",
IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Portsmouth Office") && OR(NI_Department__r.Name = "711",NI_Department__r.Name = "719"), "R&D",
IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Portsmouth Office") && OR(NI_Department__r.Name = "510",NI_Department__r.Name = "520",NI_Department__r.Name = "530",NI_Department__r.Name = "560",NI_Department__r.Name = "601",NI_Department__r.Name = "602",NI_Department__r.Name = "603",NI_Department__r.Name = "604",NI_Department__r.Name = "900",NI_Department__r.Name = "940",NI_Department__r.Name = "950",NI_Department__r.Name = "550",NI_Department__r.Name = "540",NI_Department__r.Name = "420"), "Client Services",
IF (ISPICKVAL(Asset_Location__c, "Portsmouth Office") && OR(NI_Department__r.Name = "100",NI_Department__r.Name = "105",NI_Department__r.Name = "110",NI_Department__r.Name = "120",NI_Department__r.Name = "130",NI_Department__r.Name = "160",NI_Department__r.Name = "350",NI_Department__r.Name = "718",NI_Department__r.Name = "724",NI_Department__r.Name = "729"), "Portsmouth Enterprise", "Problem" )))))))))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Which reporting category does this asset belong to?
CustomField.label: Reporting Group
